    "startDateTime": "13th january, 2024 12:30PM +6 GMT",
    "currentDateTime": "13th january, 2024. 12:30PM +6 GMT",
    "Mgs":[
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Hi!" },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "Welcome to GYMZONE service. We provide best GYM services in whole Dhaka City." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "How are you?" },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "I am an assistant." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Do you know about Sunny Leone?" },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "I am an assistant and my expertise lies in providing information and assistance on a wide range of topics. If you have any questions or need help with something, feel free to ask!" },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Give me a list of GYMs in Dhaka." },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "Here are some gym suggestions in Dhaka: 1. Muscletech bd Gym: Location - Setaras Dream 1/11 (5th floor), Anik Plaza Bhavan, Pallabi, Mirpur, Dhaka-1217, Monthly Fee - Tk. 1000. 2. Adonize Fitness Center: Location - Adonize Fitness Center LTD, Bashundhara City, Level 9 & 10, Panthapath, Monthly Fee - Tk. 1500. 3. California Fitness (Baridhara Branch): Location - House # 319, Road # 4, (Eastern 1st and 2nd Building), DOHS, Baridhara, Dhaka-1206, Monthly Fee - Tk. 2500. 4. Fitness Plus: Location - House # 23, Road # 18, Block # A, Banani, Dhaka-1213, Monthly Fee - Tk. 2500. 5. Gym Plus: Location - Wari Super Center, 28/1, Ranking Street, Wari, Dhaka-1203, Monthly Fee - Tk. 2000. These are some of the gyms in Dhaka with their locations and monthly fees. You can choose based on your preferences and requirements." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Suggest me a GYM with price range 500 to 1000." },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "I recommend Muscletech bd Gym located in Pallabi, Mirpur. They offer a monthly fee of Tk. 1000 and provide top-class gym services with facilities like gents facility, ladies facility, steam bath facility, locker room facility, and shower facility. It's a great option within your budget range." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Well. Provide me the contact person details." },
        { "sender": "bot", "message": "Muhtasim is the contact person. You can reach out to him at support@gym-bangladesh.com or contact him at +880174486668." },
        { "sender": "human", "message": "Okay. Thank you for your service." }
    ]
}
